div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
‮يوم الخميس ‪ιʹ‬
لحم درهــميــن حوائج ثلث درهم
حطب نصف درهم جبن درهم ونصف
غال درهمين زيت البطّيخ نصف درهم
تفّاح ومشمش درهمين بــ للران درهمپن درهم
وخوخ
نصــف
درهــمين

***************
bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
yawmu ăl ḫamīsi ‪10
laḥm:un dirhamayni ḥawāʾiǧu ṯulṯu dirham:in
ḥaṭab:un niṣfu dirham:in ǧubn:un dirham:un wa niṣf:un
ġāl:un dirhamayni zaytu ăl biṭṭīḫi niṣfu dirham:in
tuffāḥ:un wa mišmiš:un dirhamayni b** li l rāni dirham:un
wa ḫawḫ:un ***
niṣf ***
dirhamayni ***

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Thursday, the tenth.
Meat [two] dirhams, commodities a third of a dirham,
fire wood a half dirham, cheese one and a half dirham,
a door-lock two dirhams, oil of melon (seeds) a half dirham,
apples and apricots two dirhams ...[...]... for the gaiters one dirham
and peaches [
a hal[f
[two] di[r]h[ams
